instruction: Create a flow chart to describe the process of collecting a debt.
output:
[Start] --> Prepare a Demand Notice 
Prepare a Demand Notice --> Send Demand Notice 
Send Demand Notice --> Wait for Reply 
Wait for Reply --> [Reply Received?] 
Reply Received? --> Send Reminder 
Reply Received? --> Contact Debt Collection Agency 
Send Reminder --> Wait for Reply
Contact Debt Collection Agency --> [End]
